articles.title: 5 years since Brexit, are Britain and the EU getting back together? - NPR
articles.description: With a war in Ukraine and the U.S. rethinking alliances, Britain and the European Union may need each other more than they thought. They're holding their first summit since Brexit Monday.
articles.content: LONDON As Britain and the European Union hold their first summit Monday since Brexit, analysts say it's less like a couple getting back together, and more like exes realizing they've still got to wor… [+6439 chars]

articles.author: William Booth, Catherine Belton, Madalin Necsutu
articles.title: Pro-European centrist beats right-wing nationalist in Romanian vote - The Washington Post
articles.description: Analysts called the presidential election the country’s most consequential since the 1989 fall of communism.
articles.content: BUCHAREST, Romania The centrist, pro-European mayor of Bucharest defeated a right-wing Euroskeptic on Sunday in a presidential election that analysts called Romanias most consequential since the 1989… [+6016 chars]
